Fireboy & Watergirl in Light Temple – Teamwork with Light and Reflection

Fireboy & Watergirl in Light Temple (also known as Fireboy & Watergirl 2) is the sequel to the popular Forest Temple game. Players once again guide Fireboy and Watergirl through intricate levels, now featuring light-based puzzles involving mirrors, switches, and beams of light to unlock doors and reach the exit.

What is Fireboy & Watergirl in Light Temple?

This installment, developed by Oslo Albet, expands on the original game by introducing light physics. Players must manipulate beams of light using mirrors and switches to activate mechanisms while managing both characters’ elemental strengths and weaknesses—Fireboy cannot touch water, and Watergirl cannot touch fire.

How to Play Fireboy & Watergirl in Light Temple

  • Fireboy Controls: Use arrow keys to move.
  • Watergirl Controls: Use W, A, S, D keys to move.
  • Light Mechanics: Use mirrors and light beams to trigger doors and platforms.
  • Avoid Opposite Elements: Fireboy and Watergirl must avoid their opposing hazards.
  • Teamwork: Coordinate both characters to solve puzzles and reach the exits.

  • Co-op or Solo Play: Work together or control both characters alone.
